title: BillPottsBigBand;Porgy&Bess(1959)Bill Evans,Al Cohn,Zoot,Phi
description:
Long out of print and lacking the master tapes, this re-issue was lovingly created

from the best vinyl that could be found by session orchestrator and director Bill

Potts (1991 re-issue).



With plenty of star power and Bill Potts' boundless creativity, this version of

Porgy and Bess is still a standout among the many recordings available.  



Original liner notes by Andre Previn (1959) who was in awe of this production.

The only downside of this torrent is the glare on my crummy pics, but that's what

happens in the wee hours of the morning with artificial lighting.



New to the database as far as I could determine........fA
